pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Command Line Interface for Lucidtech AI Services## Installation```bash$ pip install lucidtech-las-cli```## Documentation[Link to docs](https://docs.lucidtech.ai/getting-started/dev/cli)## UsageAll methods support the `--help` flag which will provide information on the purpose of the method, and what arguments could be added.```bash$ las documents create --help$ las models list --help$ las workflows update --help```## Contributing### Prerequisites```bash$ pip install -r requirements.txt$ pip install -r requirements.ci.txt ```### Run tests```bash$ make prism-start$ python -m pytest
